title: Enhancing Machine Learning Competencies: Maker Education Design with Generative AI – Preparing Prospective Teachers

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Pre-service teachers can develop three or more creative language learning scenarios when designing maker projects using generative AI
Learners can analyze the impact of integrating maker education and generative AI on language education across four dimensions (motivation, efficiency, innovativeness, practicality)
Participants can design one language learning kit combining AI-generated content with physical fabrication elements and simulate it in VR environments
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
